metadata.title: CTD Data from Ocean Ecology/Plankton Dynamics Group
metadata.description: CTD salinity, temperature, depth, and transmissivity data collected during Ocean Ecology/Plankton Dynamics cruises for such projects as, GLOBEC, JGOFS, La Perouse, SUPER, Line P/Station P, Haida Eddy, Euphausid Stock Assessment, and Harmful Algal Blooms.
keywords: South Inner Coast (Johnstone, Georgia, JDF, inlets and passages)
North Inner Coast (QCS, Hecate, Dixon Inlet and passages)
metadata.notes:
Purpose: Supports scientific and environmental research.

Supplemental Information: Custom software is available for use with this dataset.

Status: Complete

Maintenance frequency: None planned

Access constraints: Departmental

Use constraints: None

Distribution liability: These data are provided "as-is".
